response.original_title: BoA - SPECIAL LIVE 2013 Here I am
response.overview: Though BoA has been touring in Japan for years, it wasn't until 2013 that she held her first solo concert Here I Am in Korea. As expected, the petite diva put on quite the show, performing both more recent hits like Hurricane Venus, Eat You Up and Only One and classics like Girls On Top and No. 1. Join in the diva's Here I Am Special Live with this DVD release which contains the concert as well as making-of features.
response.title: BoA - SPECIAL LIVE 2013 Here I am
